front.title: Tuning the Behavior of IGMP and MLD for Routers in Mobile and Wireless Networks

abstract.t: IGMP and MLD are the protocols used by hosts and multicast routers to exchange their IP multicast group memberships with each other. This document describes the ways of IGMPv3 and MLDv2 protocol optimization for mobility, and aims to become a guideline for tuning of IGMPv3/ MLDv2 Queries and timer and counter values.
